mutants.code:
import re

def removeSpecialCharacters(s):
    s = re.sub('', '', s)
    s = re.sub('\\s+', '-', s)
    s = re.sub('-+', '-', s)
    s = re.sub('_+', '_', s)
    return s.lower()

import re

def removeSpecialCharacters(s):
    s = re.sub('[^\\w\\s_-]', 'MUTATED', s)
    s = re.sub('\\s+', '-', s)
    s = re.sub('-+', '-', s)
    s = re.sub('_+', '_', s)
    return s.lower()
